info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Transylvania, east central Jackson and southeastern Haywood Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Brevard, or near Lake Toxaway, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Lake Toxaway, Graveyard Fields, Looking Glass, Gorges State Park, Black Balsam Area, Dupont State Forest, B.R. Parkway-Black Balsam To Mount Pisgah and Balsam Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
